amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Department of Energy from using any funds appropriated in the bill to plan, propose, issue, or prescribe any new or amended standard through its Codes and Standards program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 61 in the Congressional Record of July 12, 1995, to prohibit the Dept. of Energy from using any funds appropriated in the bill to plan, propose, issue, or prescribe any new or amended standard through its Codes and Standards program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Parker amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 165, 1 Present (Roll no. 519).
